message: Bob, I have a very unique and valuable product that I believe would be of great interest to you. I'm offering it to you at a price I believe is fair, considering its potential.  While I can't disclose the details of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm open to negotiation, but I'm confident this is an opportunity you won't want to miss.  Let me know if you're interested in learning more, and we can discuss the price further.
